_module_preset=”fea687a8-ee18-4e3d-8a22-f8632c6d89c1″ global_colors_info=”{}”]Deborah brings over three decades of administrative expertise across diverse industries, showcasing exceptional organizational prowess and attention to detail. From Estee Lauder Cosmetics to Sotheby’s International Realty Canada, she has navigated roles with precision, adeptly managing calendars, events, and client relations. With a passion for tennis, she balances professional excellence with active community engagement, embodying a commitment to both personal wellness and professional excellence.

As our Executive Receptionist, Deborah leads our Yorkville office, she warmly welcomes clients, delivers exceptional customer service, and oversees the smooth operation of the office.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Email” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”b18aa299-c1f5-4ae3-b770-57d8a90417d6″ body_text_color=”#000000″ background_color=”#F7F7F7″ text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”15px|30px|15px|30px|false|false” link_option_url=”mailto:Deborah.Tone@RosenGroup.ca” global_colors_info=”{}” body_text_color__hover=”#666666″ background__hover_enabled=”on|hover” background_color__hover=”#eeeeee” background_enable_color__hover=”on”]Deborah.Tone@RosenGroup.ca[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Phone” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”b18aa299-c1f5-4ae3-b770-57d8a90417d6″ body_text_color=”#000000″ background_color=”#F7F7F7″ text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”8px||8px||false|false” custom_padding=”15px|30px|15px|30px|false|false” link_option_url=”tel:+15147827288″ global_colors_info=”{}” body_text_color__hover=”#666666″ background__hover_enabled=”on|hover” background_color__hover=”#eeeeee” background_enable_color__hover=”on”]416-975-5735[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_image src=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/deborah-tone_qr-code.png” title_text=”qr-lewis-rosen” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”6997b598-46f0-49e0-ae8b-f8c3952d4614″ hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_4_font=”Mulish|300|||||||” header_4_text_color=”#000000″ header_4_letter_spacing=”0px” background_color=”#F7F7F7″ text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”0px|30px|30px|30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

excerpt.rendered:
Executive ReceptionistDeborah brings over three decades of administrative expertise across diverse industries, showcasing exceptional organizational prowess and attention to detail. From Estee Lauder Cosmetics to Sotheby’s International Realty Canada, she has navigated roles with precision, adeptly managing calendars, events, and client relations. With a passion for tennis, she balances professional excellence with active community engagement, embodying a commitment to both personal wellness and professional excellence. As our Executive Receptionist, Deborah leads our Yorkville office, she warmly welcomes clients, delivers exceptional customer service, and oversees the smooth operation of the office.Deborah.Tone@RosenGroup.ca416-975-5735Hold your smartphone over the QR Code to download Deborah’s virtual business card

Investir dans yourself. your future.
